snippet: Allowing 2 unearned runs and striking out 10 over eight innings, C. C. Sabathia overcame two costly errors by Eduardo Nunez as the Yankees scored three runs in the fifth to beat the Rays.
abstract: New York Yankees defeat Tampa Bay Rays, 5-3.
lead_paragraph: Allowing 2 unearned runs and striking out 10 over eight innings, C. C. Sabathia overcame two costly errors by Eduardo Nunez as the Yankees scored three runs in the fifth to beat the Rays.

headline.seo: Yankees Steady Themselves by Leaning on Sabathia
headline.main: Shaky Early, Yanks Steady Themselves by Leaning on Sabathia
headline.print_headline: Shaky Early, Yanks Steady Themselves by Leaning on Sabathia
